value.title: Smart Supply Chains: Traceability Chatbots Are Closer Than Brands Realize
value.excerpt: Disparate data sources remain a key challenge for traceability. Digitized or not, supply chain data rests in multiple locations, from brands and multiple levels of suppliers to trade and compliance data. These data sources are normally unstructured, and there is currently no easy way to automatically link them into a cohesive picture.
